text: Hi Rob,watching your session was quite funny and entertaining and you managed the difficulties well :), I think at the end it was a good introduction to FNH!Actually, for the next time :}, in Italian keyboard you need to press just 3 keys for a curly brace (Alt Gr + shift + square brace), once you learn them it's not too difficult... there are worst things, such as writing with a macbook keyboard!!Bye :}
Thank you for coming: it was great having you at the event.

It was a pleasure to have dinner with you and oren :) it was really fun.  For the next event I'll manage to remember to take with us some adaptor and a Virtual Machine with Bare Visual STudio with no addin, I really understand how it is difficult to work in other laptop :). Thanks a lot for coming, and if I'll come in England some time, I'll contact you, maybe we could do a One day programming session in pub :) as you told us during the dinner.For the passport I have a question, since UK is in EU, did you really need a passport to come in Italy? When I went to UK for vacation I only needed my Italian ID card with me :).Alk.
Aah, spreading the word of pub-programming? I'd only be too happy to oblige :)We don't have an ID card in Britain, so Passport is the only way we can travel :(
Thank you today for my these, we must always heart is a thankful heart, so I'm happy every day, hope you also so!!!!!cheap bags
